author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam's fascination and experiments with acoustic imaging continues! After being impressed by the capabilities of Fluke's precision acoustic imager, Adam points its 64-microphone array at several vessels in the workshop that he knows has leaks. Using Fluke's Sound Beacon device, we're able to visualize and identify the specific location of those leaks without having to fill those vessels with water or other fluids!

Fluke ii915 Precision Acoustic Imager: https://bit.ly/44eUHVi
Fluke SB140 Sound Beacon: https://www.fluke.com/en-us/product/industrial-imaging/fluke-sb140
Adam's experiments with acoustic imaging: https://youtu.be/UPVcwDzhBZ8

Shot and edited by Josh Self
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Finds a Hidden Leak With a Sound Beacon!
